Anyone get this working...recive moviedata from internet, and not get Trial expired?

For everyone having issues with it suddenly saying trial expired, you need to pace yourself.

With previous versions of this (cracked), i was unable to do more than 50 movies automatically at a time without it suddenly saying that.

Your ip gets blocked.
So change your ip address, and do it again, but only select about 30 movies at a time.
You still may get it every now and then (i thought i was being careful, but happened after about 130 movies), but simply change ip and alls good again.

Easy way to change ip address is to disconnect your router for... 5 minutes - works with most - or connect through a proxy.
